unnormalised: Regarding the solar rooftop subsidies, a transparent process is crucial. The current disbursement rate in Maharashtra seems slow. Applicants like Mr. Sharma from Pune, who applied on 26/01/2023, are still awaiting approvals as of 17:00 hrs, 15/09/2024. Perhaps linking subsidies to Aadhaar could expedite verification by MNRE. The Rs. 50,000 subsidy should ideally be processed within 60 days per the PM-Kusum scheme guidelines. Transparency reports published quarterly, by say, IIM Ahmedabad, would bolster public trust starting 01/01/2025.
normalised: Regarding the solar rooftop subsidies, a transparent process is crucial. The current disbursement rate in Maharashtra seems slow. Applicants like Mister Sharma from Pune, who applied on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three, are still awaiting approvals as of five P M, fifteenth September two thousand and twenty four. Perhaps linking subsidies to Aadhaar could expedite verification by M N R E. The rupee fifty thousand subsidy should ideally be processed within sixty days per the P M Kusum scheme guidelines. Transparency reports published quarterly, by say, I I M Ahmedabad, would bolster public trust starting first January two thousand and twenty five.
